content.text: We’re undergoing an exciting period at the OPSS, and there’s never been a better time to join us.
Below you can find our current vacancies.
EO Human Resources Support Officer - Sunday 6th August 2023
SEO Regulatory Skills Development Manager - Wednesday 9th August 2023
HEO Engagement and Delivery Officer - Thursday 10th August 2023
HEO Senior Support Officer - Wednesday 16th August 2023
Grade 6 Head of Digital & Technology - Monday 21st August 2023
SEO Enforcement Team Leaders - Monday 21st August 2023
*please click on the links to confirm the closing date for each role.
